steps.name: VirusTotalV3_Enrich Hash
steps.description: Enrich Hash using information from VirusTotal. Supported entities: Filehash. Note: only MD5, SHA-1 and SHA-256 are supported.

parameters.name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
parameters.value: {"Engine Threshold":"1","Engine Percentage Threshold":"1","Engine Whitelist":"","Resubmit Hash":false,"Resubmit After (Days)":"30","Retrieve Comments":true,"Retrieve Sigma Analysis":true,"Sandbox":"VirusTotal Jujubox","Retrieve Sandbox Analysis":true,"Create Insight":true,"Only Suspicious Entity Insight":false,"Max Comments To Return":"10","Widget Theme":"Dark","Fetch Widget":true,"Fetch MITRE Details":false,"Lowest MITRE Technique Severity":"Low"}

steps.name: VirusTotalV3_Ping
steps.description: Test connectivity to the VirusTotal with parameters provided at the integration configuration page on the Marketplace tab.

steps.name: VirusTotalV3_Get Graph Details
steps.description: Get detailed information about graphs in VirusTotal.

steps.name: New Block 2
steps.description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.

steps.name: VirusTotalV3_Add Vote To Entity
steps.description: Add a vote to entities in VirusTotal. Supported entities: File Hash, URL, Hostname, Domain, IP Address. Note: only MD5, SHA-1 and SHA-256 Hash types are supported

steps.name: VirusTotalV3_Get Related URLs
steps.description: Get related urls to the provided entities from VirusTotal. Note: this action requires a VT Enterprise token. Supported entities: IP, URL, Filehash, Hostname, Domain. Note: only MD5, SHA-1 and SHA-256 are supported.
